i18n_homepage.message:
22/06/207 - Settings have been reset because of the update.

This extension will create a notification everytime a new episode or a new scan is released on the websites from the menu on the left.
A lot of these websites are french as my goal when I created this tool for me at the beginning was french subtitled animes.
By using the menu on your left you can configure the extension depending on any website or anime you want.
If you want a new site to be added, don't hesitate just contact me.


If you need to contact me for whatever reasons. The easiest way for me is on twitter @Equinoxbig.


Contributing : If you want to help translating / making a new icon / porting this extension to other browsers please take a look at the project on GitHub.


F.A.Q :
How to ignore a website ?
- Just set the checked titles as "accepted" and don't check anything.

extensionDescription.message: Be informed from the release of a new episode or scan by a chrome notification.
